tool_description: Extracts raw data from social media platforms including posts, user interactions, and audience information for specified time periods.

platform.description: Social media platform name (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

account_handle.description: Account username or handle to analyze

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Account not found: The specified account handle does not exist on the platform
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format
Insufficient permissions: Account access permissions are required for data extraction
Rate limit exceeded: API rate limits have been exceeded, try again later
usage: Specify platform, account_handle, date range, and data_types array. The tool will authenticate and extract the requested data types for the specified time period.

platform.description: Platform name that data was extracted from

extraction_timestamp.description: When the data extraction was performed

data_summary.description: Summary of extracted data types and counts
